title: Watson Text - Chapter 5 - Many To Many

questions.text: List the names of items for which the quantity sold is greater than one for any sale.
questions.solution_query: SELECT itemname FROM item JOIN lineitem ON item.itemno = lineitem.itemno WHERE lineqty > 1

questions.text: Compute the total value of sales for each item by date.
questions.solution_query: SELECT itemname, saledate, SUM(lineqty*lineprice) FROM item JOIN lineitem ON item.itemno = lineitem.itemno JOIN sale ON sale.saleno = lineitem.salemno GROUP BY itemname, saledate

questions.text: Report all items of type “F” that have been sold.
questions.solution_query: SELECT itemname FROM item WHERE itemtype = 'F' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM lineitem WHERE lineitem.itemno = item.itemno);

questions.text: List all items of type “F” that have not been sold.
questions.solution_query: SELECT DISTINCT(itemname) FROM item WHERE itemtype = 'F' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM lineitem WHERE item.itemno = lineitem.itemno);

questions.text: Compute the total value of each sale
questions.solution_query: SELECT saleno, SUM(lineqty * lineprice) FROM lineitem GROUP BY saleno
